name: A Feeble Saga: Chapter I
description:
The first chapter in the short series about adventure and exploration.

In this chapter you will uncover an evil stirring up around a village. You begin as an aspiring adventurer, visiting a remote village devout to Aria-Alia, the Goddess of Light. Their lands have been overrun by wild beasts, not knowing of the great evil building up beneath them. Defeat this evil and you may be on the path to becoming a hero.

Key Features
  • Explore and get lost in a gorgeous 3D open world
  • Battle a variety of fearsome enemies
  • Collect treasure to purchase upgraded gear
  • Discover hidden treasures stashed throughout the land
  • Delve into depths of a haunted crypt
  • Uncover and defeat an ancient evil
